choose.when: select no, title, contents, date_format(reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d. %H:%i') as regDate, category_no as categoryNo from post where category_no = #{categoryNo } order by reg_date desc
choose.otherwise: select p.no, p.title, p.contents, date_format(p.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d. %H:%i') as regDate, 0 as categoryNo, c.blog_id as blogId from post p, category c where p.category_no = c.no and c.blog_id = #{id } order by reg_date desc

choose.when: select p.no, p.title, p.contents, p.reg_date as regDate, p.category_no as categoryNo from post p, category c where p.category_no = c.no and c.blog_id = #{id } and p.category_no = #{categoryNo } and p.reg_date = (select max(reg_date) from post where category_no = #{categoryNo })
